data.name: aim1Title
data.value: To increase the number of yogis in society

data.name: aim1Body
data.value: As well as to raise awareness and enthusiasm for yoga as a way of life for all segments of society and all ages. This will be accomplished by increasing and encouraging activities and initiatives, as well as building a generation of sports enthusiasts and professionals who are driven by a genuine desire to create a healthy sports society that recognizes that yoga is for everyone. It will also help stand out in local and international competitions and events.

data.name: aim2Body
data.value: Supports and regulates this sport and develops sustainable educational and recreational programs, raises public awareness, and prepares members of society to practice and be aware of its correct content and principles. This will lead to physical and mental well-being.

data.name: aim3Body
data.value: realizes the importance of mental and physical health and its impact on daily life by providing and supporting various types of sports programs and awareness sessions for all community groups.

data.name: visionmissionObjDesc
data.value: Our Vision, Mission, Objectives and Strategic Objectives.

data.name: MissionBody
data.value: Motivating yoga practitioners to spread awareness and enthusiasm in practicing yoga as a lifestyle for all segments of society. And increase activities and initiatives to build a generation of yoga lovers and professionals who will contribute to raising a healthy community.

data.name: LearningGrowthBody
data.value: Participation opportunities for educational and health sectors, private, local and international, to activate valuable programs with a sustainable impact.

data.name: ClientFocusBody
data.value: Increasing society awareness of the importance of mental and physical health and its impact on daily life by providing and supporting programs.

data.name: VisionBody
data.value: To be the regional lighthouse that supports and organizes the sport of yoga by developing sustainable educational and recreational programs, and raising the level of public awareness by rehabilitating a community practicing yoga with proper content and principles. To enjoy the well-being of physical and mental health.

data.name: InternalProceduresBody
data.value: Designing a scientific and professional framework for practicing and teaching yoga in order to ensure high quality, safe, available yoga education for all groups of society.

data.name: FinancialsBody
data.value: Develop a financial sustainability plan for the committee.

data.name: PlatformTitleDesc
data.value: This platform serves as a comprehensive resource for certified trainers, centers, gyms, and yoga clubs in Saudi Arabia.

data.name: AboutUsBody
data.value: The Saudi Yoga Committee is a sports committee that operates under the Saudi Arabian Olympic Committee, which is affiliated with the Ministry of Sports. The Committee was formed in 2021 to respond to the growing popularity of this sport in Saudi Arabia. Yoga has a large fan base across the country, and there is a genuine desire to supervise and develop its activities, as well as to support and improve the performance of yogis and sport professionals. A true desire exists to improve training quality and activate national participation in future international yoga tournaments and competitions. The Saudi Yoga Committee is a sports committee that operates under the Saudi Arabian Olympic Committee, which is affiliated with the Ministry of Sports. The Committee was formed in 2021 to respond to the growing popularity of this sport in Saudi Arabia. Yoga has a large fan base across the country, and there is a genuine desire to supervise and develop its activities, as well as to support and improve the performance of yogis and sport professionals. A true desire exists to improve training quality and activate national participation in future international yoga tournaments and competitions.
